doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes materials from artists, including, among others, Ilya & Emilia Kababov, Wolf Kahn, Amar Kanwar, Alex Katz, Betsy Kaufman, Mike Kelley, Michael Kenna, Byron Kim, Martin Kippenberger, Ragnar Kjartansson, Mark Klett, Dorothy Koppelman, Victor Kord, Joyce Kozloff, Max Kozloff, Yayoi Kusama, Robert Kushner, and Su Kwak. Also includes a fold-out board for the exhibition, "Jitish Kallat: Decimal Point." Includes a Met sheet on "Sara Berman's Closet" by the artist, Maira Kalman. Also includes a brochure from Highpoint Center for Printing on the artist, Michael Kareken, with a biography. Also includes a MOMA Kids Family Activity Guide to the exhibition, "William Kentridge: Five Themes." Includes a bookmark designed by Alison Knowles. Includes a pamphlet for a program put on by Stonybrook University on the Art and Life of Lee Krasner.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> K (Set 2)
